titleStmt.title: Judge Jenkin's plea delivered in to the Earle of Manchester, and the Speaker of the House of Commons sitting in the Chancery at Westminster. Which was read by their command in open court, the 14. of February 1647. And there avowed, / by David Ienkins, prisoner in Newgate.
titleStmt.author: Jenkins, David, 1582-1663.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
